radius.description: Determines the radius of the area.
radius.markdownDescription: Determines the radius of the area.

shape.description: Determines the shape of the area.
shape.markdownDescription: Determines the shape of the area.

bientity_action.description: The bi-entity action to execute on either or both the '**actor**' or the '**target(s)**'.
bientity_action.markdownDescription: The bi-entity action to execute on either or both the '**actor**' or the '**target(s)**'.

bientity_condition.description: If specified, the specified bi-entity action will only be executed on either or both the '**actor**' or '**target(s)**' that fulfill this bi-entity condition.
bientity_condition.markdownDescription: If specified, the specified bi-entity action will only be executed on either or both the '**actor**' or '**target(s)**' that fulfill this bi-entity condition.

type.description:
[Entity Action Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_action_types/area_of_effect)

Executes a [Bi-Entity Action](../bientity_action_types.md) within a specified radius.

Type ID: `origins:area_of_effect`


!!! note

    In the context of this entity action type, the '**actor**' is the entity that invoked the action and the '**target(s)**' is/are the entity/entities within the specified radius.
type.markdownDescription:
[Entity Action Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_action_types/area_of_effect)

Executes a [Bi-Entity Action](../bientity_action_types.md) within a specified radius.

!!! note

    In the context of this entity action type, the '**actor**' is the entity that invoked the action and the '**target(s)**' is/are the entity/entities within the specified radius.
